sense.def: Alternative Names shi zhi 濕滯 , sluggish moisture.

Etiological Agent. of moisture evil having settled in the organs and conduits. Tai ping hui min he ji Recipe book. Northern Song, ju fang 1107~1110. 太平惠民和劑局方 3 Recipe Entry shou zhong jin wan 守中金丸 , gold pills that guard the center: 又治脾胃 留濕，體 重節痛，面色萎黃，肌肉消瘦 , “In addition they cure abiding moisture in the spleen and stomach, a feeling of bodily heaviness, aching joints, wilting-yellow complexion, as well as emaciation”.
